basic_info.name: IIIT Pune Admission Process
description: IIIT Pune Admission 2024 is based on scores in JEE-Main & GATE examinations for the BTech and MTech courses. Interested candidates can visit the official website of the concerned examination and fill out the application form by paying the prescribed fee online. IIIT Pune BTech students must fill JEE-Main 2024 application form and MTech students must fill out GATE 2024 forms via the official websites. The JoSAA counselling is conducted after the BTech program selection process, which is based on the JEE Main score. Candidates who meet the eligibility requirements are admitted to the MTech program based on their valid GATE scores, after which the institute conducts counseling rounds.

basic_info.name: IIIT Pune Campus
description: Indian Institute of Information Technology (IIIT) Pune is operating from a temporary campus which is located at Ambegaon Budruk, Sinhagad Institute Road, Pune 411041. The temporary IIIT Pune campus is located 20 km from Pune Airport and 13 km from Pune Railway Station. The institute is planned to eventually relocate to a 100-acre permanent campus at Nanoli Tarf Chakan, close to Talegaon Dabhade.

IIIT Pune Library is spacious and divided into different sections to facilitate the proper utilization of available resources. The iSLIM software automates the library and offers a plethora of services, including book search, book reservation, renewal and account checking details via an online portal. IIIT Pune Hostels are equipped with basic amenities such as beds, study tables and storage space. IIITP has hostels for both boys and girls. Sports facilities for games like basketball, badminton, cricket and football are available on campus. The institute offers WiFi access to students for academic and recreational use.

Section.name: About IIIT Pune
Section.description:
Indian Institute of Information Technology Pune is one of the leading institutions and a vital part of the IIIT Chain of Institutions. It is one of the newly established IIITs established under the Public-Private Partnership (PPP) in 2016. The institute is approved by AICTE & UGC.
IIIT Pune offers courses like B.Tech, M.Tech & PhD. B.Tech is one of the most opted course at IIIT Pune. The institute offers B.tech in two specializations i.e. CSE and ECE. IIITP BTech Admissions are done based on JEE Main followed by JoSAA counselling and the first-year fee charged by the institute is INR 2.55 Lakhs. For M.tech admissions, the institute accepts GATE scores followed by CCMT Counselling. Further, students with UGC/CSIR NTA-NET- JRF exam or INSPIRE PhD fellowship can apply for IIIT Pune PhD admission.
As per the latest statistics available on the official website, IIIT Pune highest package offered stands at INR 53 LPA & INR 9 LPA for B.Tech CSE & M.Tech CSE respectively. The overall placement percentage at IIIT Pune during the placement drive of 2023 was 66.84%. Some of the top recruiters at IIIT Pune Placement include Accenture, Amazon, TCS Digital, Goldman Sachs, Josh Technologies, Betsol, Centelon, Google & KPIT Tech Ltd etc.

Ques. What is the minimum eligibility for PhD Admission in 2024 at IIIT Pune?
Ans. Master’s degree in Engineering/ Technology or a Master’s degree by Research (M.S. By Research) in Engineering/ Technology disciplines with a minimum of 60% aggregate marks is the minimum eligibility for PhD Admission 2024 at IIIT Pune.

IIIT Pune Admission 2024 is based on scores in JEE-Main & GATE examinations for the BTech and MTech courses. Interested candidates can visit the official website of the concerned examination and fill out the application form by paying the prescribed fee online. IIIT Pune BTech students must fill JEE-Main 2024 application form and MTech students must fill out GATE 2024 forms via the official websites. The JoSAA counselling is conducted after the BTech program selection process, which is based on the JEE Main score. Candidates who meet the eligibility requirements are admitted to the MTech program based on their valid GATE scores, after which the institute conducts counseling rounds.
At the time of application, there is no requirement for submission of documents. However, when a candidate has been allotted a seat and asked to report at a center, he/she has to produce the following documents for verification.
Ques. Are there any counseling rounds after appearing for JEE-Main & GATE at IIIT Pune?
Ans. Yes, IIIT Pune BTech Admission is purely done based on JEE-Main followed by JoSAA counselling. Candidates who meet the eligibility requirements are admitted to the MTech program based on their valid GATE scores, after which the institute conducts counseling rounds.
Ques. What is the seat intake capacity in BTech at IIIT Pune?
Ans. The total seat intake capacity for the BTech program is 269 students out of which certain seats are reserved for categories like OBC/SC/ST.

Here are some insights on IIIT Pune, IIT Guwahati, IIIT Vadodara & IIIT Nagpur to know which one is a better option.
Ques. How to reach IIIT Pune?
Ans. Air travel is an option if you're traveling from a far-off place to Pune International Airport. To get to IIIT Pune from the airport, you can take a taxi or use app-based taxi services. Pune has excellent rail connections. To get to IIIT Pune, you can take a bus, autorickshaw, or taxi after arriving at Shivajinagar or Pune Junction Railway Station. To get to IIIT Pune, you can take the local bus service. For the best route, consult the local bus authorities or consult a navigation app.
Ques. How is the faculty at IIIT Pune?
Ans. IIIT Pune Faculty has about 50 excellent and highly qualified members. All of the PhD holding faculty members at our university are highly qualified and well-respected for their helpfulness.
Ques. Is IIIT Pune government or private?
Ans. IIIT Pune is indeed a government institution. It was founded as a Not-for-profit Public Private Partnership (N-PPP) Institution by the Ministry of Education (MoE), formerly the Ministry of Human Resource Development, the Government of India, and a few business partners. The college is located in Pune, Maharashtra.
Ques. How are the placements at IIIT Pune?
Ans. IIIT Pune Placement's highest package stood at INR 53 LPA whereas IIIT Pune's average package stood at INR 16.25 LPA and the median package was recorded at INR 8.05 LPA. Over 110+ Companies participated in the IIIT Pune Placement.
Ques. Is there any hostel facility at IIIT Pune?
Ans. Yes, IIIT Pune has a hostel facility for both boys and girls. IIIT Pune Hostels have spacious rooms with separate bathrooms. Basic amenities like beds, study tables, and storage space are given to every student. There are 2 Messes outside the hostels and students can choose either. Several other utility shops are also present.
Ques. What are the top courses offered at IIITP?
Ans. The top courses offered at IIITP are BTech & MTech admissions to these courses will be done on the basis of JEE-Main & GATE scores. BTech & MTech at IIIT Pune is offered in major specializations like Computer Science & Engineering and Electronics & Communication.
Ques. What are the fees for BTech at IITP?
Ans. The fee structure for IIIT Pune BTech are as follows:
